top_comments.comment: If Younkin wins I will move to VA instead of MD.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Republicans want our Country to be a Theocracy, with huge Wealth Gaps, a slew of Small Businesses, Homogeneous, poor Education, and Small Government, no Resource Regulations, strong Military and Police, and Trump forever. That is many countries in Africa 😑. That is some African Nations to a tee. None of our Blue Ideas are good? Really? Really? Since we are the Devil and Everytime we vote "it must be a 🤥".What y'all want to do? The country has been primarily Red. So nothing new? Nothing Blue?
He's Bart Simpson's kind of governor
